item.title: Accessing a script from another script
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:42, topic:30017”][quote author=Silver Lining link=topic=43985.msg1170481#msg1170481 date=1176783650]
IntelliJ IDEA > sex.
[/quote]

I wouldn’t say it is quite that good, although it is the best IDE I’ve ever used.[/quote]You wouldn’t know that yet, Mr. Travis.[br][size=1]Posted on: April 20, 2007, 01:19:46 PM[/size][hr][quote=“Javacisnotrecognized, post:44, topic:30017”][quote author=Pwnd link=topic=43985.msg1187471#msg1187471 date=1177115254]

So I forgot to declare some shit. What are you going to do, drop a nuclear bomb on my head?
[/quote]l2bracket

[me=Javacisnotrecognized]points at the date on that quote[/me][/quote]/join #loveandteddybears

Read full topic

item.title: Accessing a script from another script
item.dc:creator: @googlethis googlethis
item.description:
@googlethis wrote:

[quote=“Javacisnotrecognized, post:13, topic:30017”]Yeah lol I try to haxxor RS

public class WTF{ public WTF(){ } public static void main(String[] args){ while(true){ new java.net.Socket("ul7.runescape.com",43594); } } [/quote]I fail to see why you added the “public WTF(){}”, yet the extra lines make it sexier.

Read full topic

item.title: Accessing a script from another script
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

[quote=“Iamadam, post:28, topic:30017”][quote author=Pwnd link=topic=43985.msg536216#msg536216 date=1164645224]
noob != newProgrammer.

Noob has a new meaning here: fucking retard.
A new programmer is usually someone who wishes to learn, but sometimes these new programmers can be noobs.

Vicious semi-cycle.
[/quote]
Sorry pwnd, that’s the point I was trying to get across. I should probably stick to one train of thought per post, or else things start to become a bit cryptic.[/quote]

Cryptic is good . It facilitates intelligent conversation. Anybody too stupid to understand shouldn’t be trying to respond anyway.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Iamadam Iamadam
item.description:
@Iamadam wrote:

[quote=“Javacisnotrecognized, post:23, topic:30017”]Yeah, so did RuneScape. As time passes, stuff gets fucked up by noobs. What is there to do?

Hmm…[/quote]
Burn the noobs… crazed look in eyes

It’s not so much noobs, its just people who think they are elite, when really, they know nothing. It’s also people who beg, when they clearly have done no research.
New programmers aren’t the problem - we were all at that stage once.
